i recommends cs with 9/10 because is an awesome skill based game and is one of the few games that is not pay2win, and id dont think that a shitty game will be in esl and that kind of shit, but the community... the most toxic community of the world, the smurfs and the cheaters they make this game an rage simulator but still, if you can get prime without commiting suicide then is a really low chance to meet any hackers/smurfs in your game  and i am happy that gaben fixed at least a bit with tape the hit "box" it is stil an awesome game to play and this is why i recommand this game
